mapper.select: SELECT A.* FROM (SELECT A.*,B.BUSSTOPSEQ AS busStopSeq, B.BUSSTOP AS busStop, B.BUSSTOPLATITUDE AS busStopLatitude, B.BUSSTOPLONGITUDE AS busStopLongitude FROM (SELECT A.*,B.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ AS busStopDetailCategorySeq,B.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSTAT AS busStopDetailCategoryStat, B.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYNAME AS busStopDetailCategoryName, B.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYINTERVAL AS busStopDetailCategoryInterval FROM (SELECT B.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ AS busStopCategorySeq,B.BUSSTOPCATEGORY AS busStopCategory,B.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSTAT AS busStopCategoryStat, A.UNIVERSITYSEQ AS universitySeq, A.UNIVERSITYNAME AS universityName, A.UNIVERSITYTEL AS universityTel FROM UNIVERSITY A INNER JOIN BUSSTOP_CATEGORY B ON A.UNIVERSITYSEQ = B.UNIVERSITYSEQ) A INNER JOIN BUSSTOP_DETAIL_CATEGORY B ON A.busStopCategorySeq = B.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ) A INNER JOIN BUSSTOP B ON A.busStopDetailCategorySeq = B.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ) A WHERE universitySeq=#{universitySeq} and busStopDetailCategoryStat ='show' and busStopCategoryStat = 'show'

SELECT UNIVERSITYSEQ AS universitySeq, UNIVERSITYNAME AS universityName, UNIVERSITYTEL AS universityTel, UNIVERSITYLATITUDE AS universityLatitude, UNIVERSITYLONGITUDE AS universityLongitude FROM UNIVERSITY WHERE universitySeq = #{universitySeq}
SELECT BUSSTOPSEQ AS busStopSeq, BUSSTOP AS busStop, BUSSTOPLATITUDE AS busStopLatitude, BUSSTOPLONGITUDE AS busStopLongitude FROM BUSSTOP WHERE busStopSeq=#{busStopSeq}

SELECT AROUNDPLACESEQ AS aroundPlaceSeq,AROUNDPLACENAME AS aroundPlaceName,AROUNDPLACELATITUDE AS aroundPlaceLatitude,AROUNDPLACELONGITUDE AS aroundPlaceLongitude,AROUNDPLACESTAT AS aroundPlaceStat FROM AROUND_PLACE;

SELECT A.* FROM (SELECT A.*, B.UNIVERSITYNAME AS universityName, B.UNIVERSITYTEL AS universityTel, B.UNIVERSITYLATITUDE AS universityLatitude, B.UNIVERSITYLONGITUDE AS universityLongitude FROM (SELECT A.*, B.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ AS busStopCategorySeq, B.BUSSTOPCATEGORY AS busStopCategory,B.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSTAT AS busStopCategoryStat, B.UNIVERSITYSEQ AS universitySeq FROM (SELECT B.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSTAT AS busStopDetailCategoryStat, B.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYNAME AS busStopDetailCategoryName ,A.BUSSTOPSEQ AS busStopSeq, A.BUSSTOP AS busStop, A.BUSSTOPLATITUDE AS busStopLatitude, A.BUSSTOPLONGITUDE AS busStopLongitude, A.BUSSTOPLINE AS busStopLine FROM BUSSTOP A INNER JOIN BUSSTOP_DETAIL_CATEGORY B ON A.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ = B.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ) A INNER JOIN BUSSTOP_CATEGORY B) A INNER JOIN UNIVERSITY B ON A.universitySeq = B.UNIVERSITYSEQ) A WHERE universitySeq = #{universitySeq} and busStopCategorySeq = #{busStopCategorySeq} and busStopDetailCategoryStat ='show' and busStopCategoryStat = 'show'

SELECT H.*,I.BUSINFOSEQ AS busInfoSeq, I.BUSINFONUM AS businfoNum, I.BUSINFONAME AS businfoName FROM (SELECT F.*,G.DEVICEBUSSEQ,G.BUSINFOSEQ AS businfoSeq FROM (SELECT * FROM LOCATION WHERE LOCATIONTIME IN (SELECT MAX(E.LOCATIONTIME) FROM UNIVERSITY A INNER JOIN BUSSTOP_CATEGORY B ON A.UNIVERSITYSEQ = B.UNIVERSITYSEQ INNER JOIN BUSSTOP_DETAIL_CATEGORY C ON B.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ =C.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ INNER JOIN BUSSTOP D ON C.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ=D.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ INNER JOIN LOCATION E ON D.BUSSTOPSEQ=E.BUSSTOPSEQ WHERE A.UNIVERSITYSEQ = #{universitySeq} AND B.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ = #{busStopCategorySeq} GROUP BY E.DEVICESEQ)) F INNER JOIN DEVICE_BUS G ON F.DEVICESEQ = G.DEVICESEQ) H INNER JOIN BUS_INFO I ON H.BUSINFOSEQ = I.BUSINFOSEQ

SELECT Z.* FROM (SELECT Y.*,D.LOCATIONSEQ AS locationSeq, D.LOCATIONLATITUDE AS locationLatitude, D.LOCATIONLONGITUDE AS locationLongitude, D.LOCATIONTIME AS locationTime,D.BUSSTOPSEQ AS busStopSeq FROM (SELECT X.*, C.UNIVERSITYSEQ AS universitySeq, C.DEVICEMODEL AS deviceModel, C.DEVICETEL AS deviceTel FROM (SELECT B.DEVICEBUSSTAT AS deviceBusStat, B.DEVICEBUSREGDATE AS deviceBusRegdate, B.DEVICESEQ AS deviceSeq, A.BUSINFOSEQ AS busInfoSeq, A.BUSINFONUM AS busInfoNum, A.BUSINFONAME AS busInfoName, A.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ AS busStopCategorySeq, A.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ AS busStopDetailCategorySeq FROM BUS_INFO A INNER JOIN DEVICE_BUS B ON A.BUSINFOSEQ = B.BUSINFOSEQ WHERE B.DEVICEBUSSTAT='show') X INNER JOIN DEVICE C ON X.deviceSeq = C.DEVICESEQ) Y INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM LOCATION WHERE LOCATIONTIME > DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -10 MINUTE),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) D ON D.DEVICESEQ = Y.deviceSeq) Z WHERE Z.universitySeq = #{universitySeq} AND Z.busStopCategorySeq = #{busStopCategorySeq} AND Z.busStopDetailCategorySeq = #{busStopDetailCategorySeq}

SELECT Z.* FROM (SELECT Y.*,D.LOCATIONSEQ AS locationSeq, D.LOCATIONLATITUDE AS locationLatitude, D.LOCATIONLONGITUDE AS locationLongitude, D.LOCATIONTIME AS locationTime,D.BUSSTOPSEQ AS busStopSeq FROM (SELECT X.*, C.UNIVERSITYSEQ AS universitySeq, C.DEVICEMODEL AS deviceModel, C.DEVICETEL AS deviceTel FROM (SELECT B.DEVICEBUSSTAT AS deviceBusStat, B.DEVICEBUSREGDATE AS deviceBusRegdate, B.DEVICESEQ AS deviceSeq, A.BUSINFOSEQ AS busInfoSeq, A.BUSINFONUM AS busInfoNum, A.BUSINFONAME AS busInfoName, A.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ AS busStopCategorySeq, A.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ AS busStopDetailCategorySeq FROM BUS_INFO A INNER JOIN DEVICE_BUS B ON A.BUSINFOSEQ = B.BUSINFOSEQ WHERE B.DEVICEBUSSTAT='show') X INNER JOIN DEVICE C ON X.deviceSeq = C.DEVICESEQ) Y INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM LOCATION WHERE LOCATIONTIME > DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -10 MINUTE),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) D ON D.DEVICESEQ = Y.deviceSeq) Z WHERE Z.universitySeq = #{universitySeq} AND Z.busStopCategorySeq = #{busStopCategorySeq} AND Z.busStopDetailCategorySeq = #{busStopDetailCategorySeq} AND locationTime = (SELECT MAX(Z.locationTime) FROM (SELECT Y.*,D.LOCATIONSEQ AS locationSeq, D.LOCATIONLATITUDE AS locationLatitude, D.LOCATIONLONGITUDE AS locationLongitude, D.LOCATIONTIME AS locationTime,D.BUSSTOPSEQ AS busStopSeq FROM (SELECT X.*, C.UNIVERSITYSEQ AS universitySeq, C.DEVICEMODEL AS deviceModel, C.DEVICETEL AS deviceTel FROM (SELECT B.DEVICEBUSSTAT AS deviceBusStat, B.DEVICEBUSREGDATE AS deviceBusRegdate, B.DEVICESEQ AS deviceSeq, A.BUSINFOSEQ AS busInfoSeq, A.BUSINFONUM AS busInfoNum, A.BUSINFONAME AS busInfoName, A.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ AS busStopCategorySeq, A.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ AS busStopDetailCategorySeq FROM BUS_INFO A INNER JOIN DEVICE_BUS B ON A.BUSINFOSEQ = B.BUSINFOSEQ WHERE B.DEVICEBUSSTAT='show') X INNER JOIN DEVICE C ON X.deviceSeq = C.DEVICESEQ) Y INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM LOCATION WHERE BUSSTOPSEQ IS NOT NULL AND LOCATIONTIME > DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -10 MINUTE),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) D ON D.DEVICESEQ = Y.deviceSeq) Z WHERE Z.universitySeq = #{universitySeq} AND Z.busStopCategorySeq = #{busStopCategorySeq} AND Z.busStopDetailCategorySeq = #{busStopDetailCategorySeq})

SELECT Y.*, D.BUSINFONAME, D.BUSINFONUM, D.BUSINFOSTAT, D.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ, D.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ FROM (SELECT X.*, C.DEVICEBUSSTAT, C.BUSINFOSEQ FROM (SELECT A.*,B.DEVICETEL, B.UNIVERSITYSEQ FROM (SELECT ODBYLO.* FROM( SELECT * FROM LOCATION WHERE BUSSTOPSEQ IS NOT NULL AND LOCATIONTIME > DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -10 MINUTE),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ORDER BY LOCATIONTIME DESC LIMIT 0,500) ODBYLO GROUP BY DEVICESEQ HAVING MAX(LOCATIONTIME)) A INNER JOIN DEVICE B ON B.DEVICESEQ = A.DEVICESEQ ) X INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM DEVICE_BUS WHERE DEVICEBUSSTAT = 'show') C ON C.DEVICESEQ = X.DEVICESEQ) Y INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM BUS_INFO WHERE BUSINFOSTAT='show') D ON D.BUSINFOSEQ = Y.BUSINFOSEQ WHERE Y.UNIVERSITYSEQ = #{universitySeq} AND D.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ = #{busStopCategorySeq} AND D.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ = #{busStopDetailCategorySeq}

SELECT Y.*, D.BUSINFONAME, D.BUSINFONUM, D.BUSINFOSTAT, D.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ, D.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ FROM (SELECT X.*, C.DEVICEBUSSTAT, C.BUSINFOSEQ FROM (SELECT A.*,B.DEVICETEL, B.UNIVERSITYSEQ FROM (SELECT ODBYLO.* FROM( SELECT * FROM LOCATION WHERE LOCATIONTIME > DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -10 MINUTE),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ORDER BY LOCATIONTIME DESC LIMIT 0,5000) ODBYLO GROUP BY DEVICESEQ HAVING MAX(LOCATIONTIME)) A INNER JOIN DEVICE B ON B.DEVICESEQ = A.DEVICESEQ ) X INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM DEVICE_BUS WHERE DEVICEBUSSTAT = 'show') C ON C.DEVICESEQ = X.DEVICESEQ) Y INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM BUS_INFO WHERE BUSINFOSTAT='show') D ON D.BUSINFOSEQ = Y.BUSINFOSEQ WHERE Y.UNIVERSITYSEQ = #{universitySeq} AND D.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ = #{busStopCategorySeq} AND D.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ = #{busStopDetailCategorySeq}

SELECT AVG(busStoplatitude) AS avgLat,AVG(busStoplongitude) AS avgLon FROM(SELECT A.*,B.BUSSTOPSEQ AS busStopSeq, B.BUSSTOP AS busStop, B.BUSSTOPLATITUDE AS busStopLatitude, B.BUSSTOPLONGITUDE AS busStopLongitude FROM (SELECT A.*,B.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ AS busStopDetailCategorySeq, B.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYNAME AS busStopDetailCategoryName, B.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYINTERVAL AS busStopDetailCategoryInterval FROM (SELECT B.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ AS busStopCategorySeq,B.BUSSTOPCATEGORY AS busStopCategory, A.UNIVERSITYSEQ AS universitySeq, A.UNIVERSITYNAME AS universityName, A.UNIVERSITYTEL AS universityTel FROM UNIVERSITY A INNER JOIN BUSSTOP_CATEGORY B ON A.UNIVERSITYSEQ = B.UNIVERSITYSEQ) A INNER JOIN BUSSTOP_DETAIL_CATEGORY B ON A.busStopCategorySeq = B.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ) A INNER JOIN BUSSTOP B ON A.busStopDetailCategorySeq = B.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ) A;

SELECT AVG(busStoplatitude) AS avgLat,AVG(busStoplongitude) AS avgLon, MIN(BUSSTOPLONGITUDE) as minLon,MAX(BUSSTOPLONGITUDE) as maxLon, MIN(BUSSTOPLATITUDE) AS minLat, MAX(BUSSTOPLATITUDE) AS maxLat FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT Y.*,D.BUSSTOPSEQ AS busStopSeq, D.BUSSTOP AS busStop, D.BUSSTOPLATITUDE AS busStopLatitude, D.BUSSTOPLONGITUDE AS busStopLongitude,D.BUSSTOPLINE AS busStopLine FROM (SELECT X.* FROM (SELECT B.UNIVERSITYSEQ AS universitySeq, B.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ, A.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ AS busStopDetailCategorySeq, A.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYNAME AS busStopDetailCategoryName FROM BUSSTOP_DETAIL_CATEGORY A INNER JOIN BUSSTOP_CATEGORY B ON A.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ = B.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ) X INNER JOIN UNIVERSITY C ON X.universitySeq=C.UNIVERSITYSEQ) Y INNER JOIN BUSSTOP D ON Y.busStopDetailCategorySeq = D.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ ) Z WHERE universitySeq = #{universitySeq} AND BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ=#{busStopCategorySeq} AND busStopDetailCategorySeq = #{busStopDetailCategorySeq}) A;

SELECT Y.busStopDetailCategorySeq FROM (SELECT X.* FROM (SELECT B.UNIVERSITYSEQ AS universitySeq, B.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ, A.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ AS busStopDetailCategorySeq,B.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSTAT AS busStopCategoryStat, A.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYNAME AS busStopDetailCategoryName, A.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSTAT AS busStopDetailCategoryStat FROM BUSSTOP_DETAIL_CATEGORY A INNER JOIN BUSSTOP_CATEGORY B ON A.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ = B.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ) X INNER JOIN UNIVERSITY C ON X.universitySeq=C.UNIVERSITYSEQ) Y WHERE universitySeq = #{universitySeq} AND BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ = #{busStopCategorySeq} and busStopDetailCategoryStat ='show' and busStopCategoryStat = 'show' ORDER BY Y.busStopDetailCategorySeq ASC limit 0,1

SELECT * FROM (SELECT X.* FROM (SELECT B.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSTAT AS busStopCategoryStat, B.UNIVERSITYSEQ AS universitySeq, B.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ, A.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ AS busStopDetailCategorySeq, A.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYNAME AS busStopDetailCategoryName,A.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSTAT AS busStopDetailCategoryStat FROM BUSSTOP_DETAIL_CATEGORY A INNER JOIN BUSSTOP_CATEGORY B ON A.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ = B.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ) X INNER JOIN UNIVERSITY C ON X.universitySeq=C.UNIVERSITYSEQ) Y WHERE UNIVERSITYSEQ = #{universitySeq} AND BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ=#{busStopCategorySeq} and busStopDetailCategoryStat ='show' and busStopCategoryStat = 'show' ORDER BY busStopDetailCategorySeq ASC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT Y.*,D.BUSSTOPSEQ AS busStopSeq, D.BUSSTOP AS busStop, D.BUSSTOPLATITUDE AS busStopLatitude, D.BUSSTOPLONGITUDE AS busStopLongitude,D.BUSSTOPLINE AS busStopLine, D.BUSSTOPORDER AS busStopOrder FROM (SELECT X.* FROM (SELECT B.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSTAT AS busStopCategoryStat, B.UNIVERSITYSEQ AS universitySeq, B.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ, A.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ AS busStopDetailCategorySeq, A.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYNAME AS busStopDetailCategoryName,A.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSTAT AS busStopDetailCategoryStat FROM BUSSTOP_DETAIL_CATEGORY A INNER JOIN BUSSTOP_CATEGORY B ON A.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ = B.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ) X INNER JOIN UNIVERSITY C ON X.universitySeq=C.UNIVERSITYSEQ) Y INNER JOIN BUSSTOP D ON Y.busStopDetailCategorySeq = D.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ ) Z WHERE universitySeq = #{universitySeq} AND BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ=#{busStopCategorySeq} AND busStopDetailCategorySeq = #{busStopDetailCategorySeq} and busStopDetailCategoryStat ='show' and busStopCategoryStat = 'show' ORDER BY busStopOrder
